title: Cloudarchitected applications
extract: Posted by: Margaret Rouse. WhatIs.com. Contributor(s): Nicholas Rando. A cloud architect is an IT professional who is responsible for overseeing a company's cloud computing strategy. This includes cloud adoption plans, cloud application design, and cloud management and monitoring.Nov 17, 2014
